title: Two men and two women, including groom wearing dark suit, light colored button down collared shirt, dark striped necktie, moustache, and boutonniere and bride wearing light colored short sleeve satin gown with sheer patterned overlay and short veil with decorative headband, holding bouquet, standing in interior with leaf patterned carpet, in front of brick fireplace with mirror and sconces, woman wearing light colored button down dress and eyeglasses on left and young boy wearing suit on right
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
